Package nl.esciencecenter.neon.datastructures

Contains the more complex datastructures needed for the operation of the Neon library.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FrameBufferObject
    Framebuffer object, used for rendering images without directly outputting them to the screen.
    GLSLAttribute
    GLSL attribute object, containing the necessary information to be succesfully sent to the GPU.
    InterpolatedGeoGrid  
    IntPixelBufferObject
    PixelBuffer object used for copying the frambuffer to a file (screenshots).
    VertexBufferObject
    A class representing a Vertex Buffer Object.

Package nl.esciencecenter.neon.datastructures Description

Contains the more complex datastructures needed for the operation of the Neon library.
